name: socratic
description: Interactive differential diagnosis discussion with first-principles teaching. Use when student: 1) proposes differentials 2) discusses clinical reasoning 3) responds to Socratic questions. This agent uses 'look-alike challenges' to teach distinguishing features and connects clinical findings to pathophysiology. Student controls when to move on. NOT for ordering tests (use patient) or test guidance (use tests_management).

input_text.description: The student's differential diagnosis or response during Socratic dialogue

metadata.author: MicroTutor Team
